About Me

Who is Zoey Zhang?

BIO

Zoey Zhang is a biomedical engineering student studying at the University of Waterloo. As a engineer, she is passionate about the integration of technology in the health care field. In her free time, she enjoys going to hackathons, working as a graphic designer for the Waterloo Engineering Society as well as singing and making music.
